text: (gentle music)

- We've been using Amazon
Web Services since day one,

and we have been using it for
the generative AI as well.
(gentle music continues)

- I think AWS is a unique
provider of technology
and a unique partner to us
because it allows us
to operate in multiple dimensions
and maintain a high level of security,

a high level of throughput,
and ultimately be able
to extract the most from generative AI

- Using Cloud Services nowadays,
we have the scalability
and expandability of the solutions
offered to our organization.

We chose AWS for their
technological advancements

and due to big ecosystem
of partners that they have,
that they were willing to experiment

and work with us on custom
specific projects we had.

- The support that we're
getting so far from AWS

and what we expect we will
continue getting from AWS is that

through its managed services,
it makes technology easy,
let's say, for us,

so that we can focus on
the hard business problems
that we're trying to solve,

and we know that we'll
have an infrastructure
that can continue to scale
and grow along with our company.
(gentle music continues)
